name: c0d3x's Angular 2 Boilerplate
tagline: This is a Boilerplate for anyone getting into Angular 2.
body:
### Information
This Boilerplate is work in progress.
And my goal is to make an easy base template to get started with a new project.
All fragmentation set aside.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
